name: Rocket Lander (Sapines)
description:
A short simulation game about rocket launching for GGJ 2018.

Note: The title said Rocket Lander, but the gameplay about Rocket Launching.

How to Play:
1. Press and Hold Space to Boost the rocket.
2. Click on the rocket part to detach it.
